slides.title: Introduction to LLMs in Python: Fine-Tuning Fundamentals
slides.content: This module covers practical Python implementation for LLM fine-tuning: loading datasets (e.g., IMDb), tokenization, Trainer configuration, and evaluating sentiment models. Key concepts include pipelines, auto classes, and partial fine-tuning strategies.

summary: This single slide introduces foundational Python workflows for fine-tuning LLMs, focusing on dataset preparation, tokenization, and model training with the Trainer class to achieve effective sentiment analysis through practical implementation examples.
